title: Ticket #3365: command| pipe summary in LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE not documented in LCF
description: LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE can contain programs to run; their standard output should be more configuration to parse. To identify such programs, they end with a pipe (|). This is documented in "3.3.1.4 Executing a Program to Produce Configuration Macros". However, this is not documented in the param entry for LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE. It should be.
remarks:
2013-Apr-01 12:12:20 by smoler:
The defn of LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE contains a reference to how to do this. I'd prefer not to copy the instructions also to this defn, as then there are 2 instances of the same thing. And, if it ever changes, someone would need to know to change both instances.

Therefore, resolving this ticket without any changes to the manual.
creator: adesmet
